testcase.classname: Launching the application from a web browser
testcase.name: Launching a browser and navigating to the applications url should open the login page of the application
testcase.system-out: Given I launch a web browser................................................passed When I navigate to the url of the web application...........................passed Then I should land on the login page........................................passed

testcase.name: Entering valid credentials and clicking submit should send me to the user portal page
testcase.system-out: Given I launch a web browser................................................passed And I navigate to the url of the web application............................passed When I enter valid credentials..............................................passed Then I should land on the user portal page..................................passed

testcase.classname: Checkin feature of the web application
testcase.name: Clicking the check in button when I have a class that day should result in a confirmation that I checked in
testcase.system-out: Given I launch a web browser................................................passed And I navigate to the url of the web application............................passed And I enter valid credentials...............................................passed When I click the check-in button............................................passed Then I should see a message confirming I checked in.........................passed

testcase.classname: Adding a class feature of the web App
testcase.name: Entering in a valid class Id to the add class form and submitting should add me to the class
testcase.system-out: Given I launch a web browser................................................passed And I navigate to the url of the web application............................passed And I enter valid credentials...............................................passed When I click the manage attendence button...................................passed And enter a valid class id '3' and submit...................................passed Then I should receive confirmation I was added to the class.................passed

testcase.classname: Adding a class feature of the web App
testcase.name: Entering in a valid class Id to the add class form and submitting should add me to the class 2
testcase.system-out: Given I launch a web browser................................................passed And I navigate to the url of the web application............................passed And I enter valid credentials...............................................passed When I click the manage attendence button...................................passed And enter a valid class id '6' and submit...................................passed Then I should receive confirmation I was added to the class.................passed

testcase.classname: Adding a class feature of the web App
testcase.name: Entering in an invalid class Id to the add class form and submitting should give me an error
testcase.system-out: Given I launch a web browser................................................passed And I navigate to the url of the web application............................passed And I enter valid credentials...............................................passed When I click the manage attendence button...................................passed And enter an invalid class id '100' and submit..............................passed Then I should receive an error message......................................passed

testcase.classname: Adding a class feature of the web App
testcase.name: Entering in an invalid class Id to the add class form and submitting should give me an error 2
testcase.system-out: Given I launch a web browser................................................passed And I navigate to the url of the web application............................passed And I enter valid credentials...............................................passed When I click the manage attendence button...................................passed And enter an invalid class id '27' and submit...............................passed Then I should receive an error message......................................passed
